Just something fun to attempt
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Just something fun to attempt
By CHB on Monday, February 16, 2004 - 03:29 am:

Truly, no topic thread in the Library could fit this topic. Just a project I wish to entertain myself with, and I'm a sucker for challenges.

The actual point of this is purely substance matter for a short fiction story. What I need, are volunteers.

So, email me at:

king_usaf2003@yahoo.com

I would say post it here, but that would take all the mystery out of it. Plus, I don't want to jumble the thread too much with long winded explanations of your characters. I just think email might be easier.

In the email, include what your character's name, appearance, roughly what age they look, and any other information as to what they look like. Please make this as detailed as possible, to save me the elaboration.

Be sure to add his/her personality as well, so I can get a real sense of charactor from them, as well as what they might be compelled to say and the demeanor of the monsters they would raise.

Also, the monster you wish to enter the tournament. It could be rare if you like, or even a breed you design, just be sure to give me very detailed information on the beast so I may do it justice.

The thing that really sets this mock tourney up, is that I will elaborate on the matches, however, the winners will be randomly selected...

By nothing more than a coin flip.

I'll roll dice to check who fights who in the initial matches, but the victor of the tourney is totally up to chance, and I can have free reign on the matches themselves to pull any two monsters into the finals.

This is all just on a whim, and I will continue with the epic I currently have going, just pausing for a community moral check, if you would. As I would call it, a squadron activity. >,o

The tournament will have an undetermined amount of contestants, depends on who all wish to compete. And, if you wish to remain anonymous, that is fine.

I'll not point out which member created which rancher, but if you wish to reply saying "You stupid CHB! You suck! You made my dude lose!", then that is entirely up to you.

Doing this on a whim, just thought it would be fun.

P.S. Cheating is allowed, and somewhat encouraged >:)
